abstract: Palestinian man Mohammed Salaymeh is arrested after ramming car into group of Israeli pedestrians and lunging at security guards with knife near police station in East Jerusalem.
lead_paragraph: A Palestinian man rammed his car into a group of Israeli pedestrians near a border police station in East Jerusalem on Friday, injuring four officers and a bystander.

headline.main: Israel: Palestinian Held in Car Attack
headline.print_headline: Israel: Palestinian Held in Car Attack

snippet: A Palestinian man rammed his car into a group of Israeli pedestrians near a border police station in East Jerusalem on Friday, injuring four officers and a bystander.
